imdb.plot outline: Country retreat. Cabin. Summer getaway. Cottage. Whatever you may call it, a vacation home is a place to escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life - to relax in nature, recharge the batteries and strip down the stress. Each episode of What's for Sale? follows a family in love with the cottage life looking to purchase the perfect getaway. With the help of a rock star realtor, we come along as the family explores three properties and decides on which vacation home is the one for them.
imdb.title: What's for Sale?
plot: Country retreat. Cabin. Summer getaway. Cottage. Whatever you may call it, a vacation home is a place to escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life - to relax in nature, recharge the batteries and strip down the stress. Each episode of _What's for Sale?_ (qv) follows a family in love with the cottage life looking to purchase the perfect getaway. With the help of a rock star realtor, we come along as the family explores three properties and decides on which vacation home is the one for them.::Cottage Life Television
